Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its worth to you stands at $8,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of strengthening our business relationship. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
